wikipedia_page.main: George Evans, 4th Baron Carbery (18 February 1766 – 31 December 1804) was a British peer and politician.

response: * George Evans, 4th Baron Carbery (1766–1804), British politician

link_mentions.page: List of people with surname Evans

response: Born Harriet Evans, she was the daughter of Hugh Evans, senior surgeon of the 5th Dragoon Guards. George Evans, 4th Baron Carbery may have been a paternal relative, as she dedicated one of her books to him.
